name: Simple Life (davidburaga)
description:
This is my first game, an my very first game jam!

The game, although far from finished, presents a character that needs to complete task, by collecting coins. The more coins you collect the more tired you get, and you start moving very slow.

w,a,s,d to move

*THIS IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE, DIDN'T HAVE TIME TO ADD MORE LEVELS*

glhf.
